commands.setup: apt install python3.12-venv python3 -m venv .venv source .venv/bin/activate pip install -e . pip install -r dev-requirements.txt
commands.precommit: ruff check --fix . black --preview . isort --profile black . pyright pytest
commands.tools:
pip install $NEW_DEPENDENCY If you use this be sure to update requirements.txt
pytest -k $TEST_NAME Run a specific test or tests matching a pattern
pytest -v -s Run tests with verbose output and print statements
black --preview --check . Check if files are formatted correctly without making changes
isort --profile black --check-only . Check if imports are sorted correctly without making changes
ruff check . Run ruff linter without applying fixes
python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel Build distribution packages
twine upload dist/* Upload distribution packages to PyPI (make sure you have the credentials set up)
mentat Run mentat to test if it's working correctly
